Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Role() [1/2]

discpp::Role::Role ( const Snowflake &  role_id,
const discpp::Guild &  guild 
)

Constructs a discpp::Role object using a role id and a guild.

This constructor searches the roles cache in the guild object to get the role object from.

discpp::Role role(657246994997444614, guild);
Parameters
[in]role_idThe role id.
[in]guildThe guild that has this role.
Returns
discpp::Role, this is a constructor.
